Articles.Content: Hacks and deactives shields, what shields

Shoots tractor beam generator

- - - Updated - - -

Uses K-Drive to teleport into the Attractor
To do that, you'd have to shoot through the tractor beam, which would tractor the energy.

Enters the Multiverse

Uses Omnipotence to transport you to Andromeda

> - - - Updated - - -

Can you make a stone that you can't lift?

Cuts ship in half using omnipotence

Then you are not omnipotent.

Yeah, remind me to put him in for a long leave for mental health
Then I go insane and return to the ship

> 
> Yeah, remind me to put him in for a long leave for mental health

Gladly...

In the meantime, we have a bigger threat [much bigger] outside. It looks like they're searching for us? That's not usual for the Krynn...

Do you have any cargo on board?
Facepalm
I hide in the cargo container
A few canister of tnt for a mining delivery. What are thinking?

Mining!?

...That doesn't sound right. They never pursue anyone unless they were carrying something or someone of great importance.

I am inside the TnT canisters

(Why are we still using TnT in this day and age? We have lasers and warp drives!!!)

> 
> Mining!?
> ...That doesn't sound right. They never pursue anyone unless they were carrying something or someone of great importance.

Their is also the body of Xannari him/herself. I keep that around as a memento of the second chance he/she gave me. They are either looking for him/her or they are looking for me.

> 
> I am inside the TnT canisters
> (Why are we still using TnT in this day and age? We have lasers and warp drives!!!)

Gotta start a mine somehow.
Him/her? What?
Wait, I have an idea, launch two shuttles one with the genetic signature of Xannari the other with mine.
And that's creepy

Oh... Yeah, about that...

Computer, deactivate photo-morphic projection.

...Surprised?
Not really. But I'm crazy, so....
Xannari?! \*looks dumbfounded\* But, how? I swore you...

You need to keep me contained

- - - Updated - - -

Muahahahahahahahahahahaha I'm crazy!!!! 

Computer, activate self-destruct sequence!

I told you, I got you good! I've been here the whole time! You fought with the actual Calehan, who was willing to give his life for you. I couldn't stand up to you.

I overlayed myself twice, both were Calehan's physical parameters, and he was overlayed once to look like me.
(Laythe, you can't HANDLE the truth! jk)
